actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require committee approval of certain travel proposals.

summary.text: Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the use of Committee funds for travel unless the official nature of the travel is established by a resolution approved in a public session by majority vote of the committee involved. Requires the resolution to set forth: (1)the proposed itinerary in detail; (2)the purpose of each destination; (3)the names of all persons who propose to take the trip at private or committee expense; (4)reimbursement provisions; (5)the anticipated benefit to the taxpayers; and (6)the estimated total expense. Requires a complete travel report to be filed with the respective committee within ten working days of the completion of travel.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require committee approval of certain travel proposals.
